channel.title: DevOps on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Building Multi-Architecture Images with a Docker Driver
item.description: As we were working on getting our app up and running with Kubernetes on Challenge 4, we built a Docker image, but it was only for ARM architecture.

item.title: Challenge 3 - Creating Real-Time Web Applications with Docker and PostgreSQL
item.description: Welcome to Challenge 3 in our cloud-native application development journey, where we integrate real-time interactions using Docker and PostgreSQL!

item.title: How to Pass the KCNA - Kubernetes And Cloud Native Associate
item.description: Yesterday I took the Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate Exam (KCNA) certification exam, and this morning I got the results that I passed, yey!

item.title: 15 Options To Build A Kubernetes Playground
item.description: Why a Kubernetes Playground ðŸ”—As a beginner, having a playground environment is crucial for experimenting and learning about Kubernetes without the fear of breaking anything.

item.title: Choose Your Tech Career: Software Engineering or DevOps?
item.description: Are you struggling to decide between two exciting tech career paths: software engineering and DevOps engineering?

item.title: An Easy Way to Understand Docker
item.description: Docker is renowned worldwide as an open-source container service provider, that excels in packaging applications and their components, along with dependencies, simplifying the deployment process.

item.title: Kubernetes Knowledge Hub
item.description: I’ll keep updating it every day with new resources!
